feed.title: Diego Petrucci - Dev Blog
feed.subtitle: iOS Engineer at Numan, sharing thoughts on development, tech, and life

entry.title: Welcome to My Dev Blog
entry.content:
Welcome to my development blog! This is where I’ll be sharing thoughts on iOS development, Swift, and other tech topics that interest me.

As an iOS engineer at Numan, I work on making healthcare more accessible for men. When I’m not coding, you can find me dancing or bouldering around London.

Stay tuned for posts about:

  • iOS development tips and tricks
  • Swift language features
  • Mobile architecture patterns
  • Development tools and workflows
  • And whatever else catches my interest!

Thanks for stopping by!

Updated: Theme should now be working correctly.
entry.summary: Welcome to my development blog! This is where I’ll be sharing thoughts on iOS development, Swift, and other tech topics that interest me.
